Name: Spellcaster
About the game: Gameplay In Spellcaster you control a mage who has to defend his hut from hordes of monsters. Lots of bullets and spells to choose from which you can buy from local store. Choose your build before the next level and face the creatures in this top-down, tower defence, shoot 'em up, action game. Story You lived peacefully in the middle of a dark forest. Gathering herbs, creating potions, and studying magic were your daily activities. It was like that until terrifying monsters started haunting you. Who ordered them to disturb your peace? Plunge yourself in the fantasy world by following the story of the old wizard and reading the rich descriptions in the bestiary. Modes Two modes available: campaign and freeplay. The campaign include structured levels with epic boss fights that end in fighting the main villain. Freeplay is an endless gameplay with randomly generated levels. Check yourself how far you can go! Atmosphere Beautiful, warm colors. Bright, cartoon, fantasy graphics. Atmospheric music.
